channel.title: Node on Partially Attended
channel.description: Recent content in Node on Partially Attended

item.title: Architect, The Killer Serverless Framework â€“ Reify
item.description: A nice overview of an npm framework for creating server-less applications on AWS. It abstracts away a lot of the plumbing, which can have upsides and downsides. I’d love to see something equivalent in python. The actual framework is here: https://arc.codes https://blog.reifyworks.com/architect-the-killer-serverless-framework-41565372811b
